title: The Yemen War Can Be Over — if Biden Wants It
description:
The U.S. is slow-walking peace negotiations, effectively pushing for a resumption of the war.

The post The Yemen War Can Be Over — if Biden Wants It appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Abortion Rights Activists Face Attack From DeSantis and Conspiracy Lawsuit — for Spray Painting
description:
The absurd RICO allegations come after the Biden administration hit the activists with federal charges that carry a 12-year sentence.

The post Abortion Rights Activists Face Attack From DeSantis and Conspiracy Lawsuit — for Spray Painting appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Turkish Elections: Erdogan’s Government Arrested and Expelled International Election Observers
description:
Ryan Grim interviews Ismael Cortés, a member of Spain’s parliament, who was expelled from Turkey as he worked as an election observer.

The post Turkish Elections: Erdogan’s Government Arrested and Expelled International Election Observers appeared first on The Intercept.
